framework.name: Task Force on Climate-related Financial Disclosures
framework.description: Framework for climate-related financial risk disclosures
framework.applicability: All organizations with climate-related risks and opportunities

pillars.name: Governance
pillars.description: The organization's governance around climate-related risks and opportunities

pillars.name: Strategy
pillars.description: The actual and potential impacts of climate-related risks and opportunities on the organization's businesses, strategy, and financial planning

pillars.name: Risk Management
pillars.description: The processes used by the organization to identify, assess, and manage climate-related risks

pillars.name: Metrics and Targets
pillars.description: The metrics and targets used to assess and manage relevant climate-related risks and opportunities

disclosures.title: Board Oversight
disclosures.description: Describe the board's oversight of climate-related risks and opportunities
disclosures.guidance: Include information about board-level processes and oversight mechanisms for climate-related issues

disclosures.title: Management Role
disclosures.description: Describe management's role in assessing and managing climate-related risks and opportunities
disclosures.guidance: Detail management structures, processes, and responsibilities for climate-related issues

disclosures.title: Climate-related Risks and Opportunities
disclosures.description: Describe the climate-related risks and opportunities the organization has identified over the short, medium, and long term
disclosures.guidance: Provide specific details about identified risks and opportunities across different time horizons

disclosures.title: Impact on Business
disclosures.description: Describe the impact of climate-related risks and opportunities on the organization's businesses, strategy, and financial planning
disclosures.guidance: Quantify impacts where possible and explain how climate considerations are integrated into business planning

disclosures.title: Resilience of Strategy
disclosures.description: Describe the resilience of the organization's strategy, taking into consideration different climate-related scenarios
disclosures.guidance: Include scenario analysis results and how they inform strategic resilience

disclosures.title: Risk Identification and Assessment
disclosures.description: Describe the organization's processes for identifying and assessing climate-related risks
disclosures.guidance: Detail methodologies, tools, and frameworks used for risk identification and assessment

disclosures.title: Risk Management Processes
disclosures.description: Describe the organization's processes for managing climate-related risks
disclosures.guidance: Explain risk management strategies, mitigation measures, and decision-making processes

disclosures.title: Integration with Overall Risk Management
disclosures.description: Describe how processes for identifying, assessing, and managing climate-related risks are integrated into the organization's overall risk management
disclosures.guidance: Demonstrate how climate risks are embedded in enterprise risk management systems

disclosures.title: Climate-related Metrics
disclosures.description: Disclose the metrics used by the organization to assess climate-related risks and opportunities
disclosures.guidance: Provide specific metrics with historical data and industry context where relevant

disclosures.title: Scope 1, 2, and 3 GHG Emissions
disclosures.description: Disclose Scope 1, Scope 2, and, if appropriate, Scope 3 greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions
disclosures.guidance: Follow GHG Protocol methodology and provide relevant breakdowns and explanations

disclosures.title: Climate-related Targets
disclosures.description: Describe the targets used by the organization to manage climate-related risks and opportunities and performance against targets
disclosures.guidance: Include baseline, target year, progress to date, and methodology for each target

materiality.threshold: Risks and opportunities that could have material financial impact

reporting.recommendedFormat: Integrated within annual report or standalone sustainability report

regulatoryMandates.applicability: Listed companies and certain financial institutions
Large financial institutions and listed companies
